name: Speed Trial
description:
I have no doubts, but neither proves that you want to play this super fun and exciting racing game.

This game has 4 minigames, 2 of them are 1vs1 so you can beat your friends using power ups and drifting like a boss.
The other 2 minigames remaining are puzzles so you can again beat your friends with your astuteness.

Hope you like it!

I recommend playing this game on full screen for better results.

Controls:

Player 1 (left player) - W A S D (MOVEMENT) / SPACEBAR (USE POWER UP).

Player 2 (right player) - Left Right Up Arrow (MOVEMENT)/ P (USE POWER UP).

PAUSE GAME - PRESS "T".

Puzzle levels will have an Instructions button on the top right corner if you have any doubt.
